page.title: 13RECREATION. TREDIS
page.content: PEOPLE AT HOME WATCH TV, PARTICULARLY THE ELDERLY.THE LOCAL PUBS ARE WELL-SUPPORTED.THERE ARE DARTS,SNOOKER AND EUCHRE LEAGUE MATCHES. THERE ARE WOMEN'S INSTITUTES AT DOWNDERRY,CRAFTHOLE AND ST.GERMANS,AND AN OVER-SIXTIES CLUB AT DOWNDERRY.SOME LOCAL AUTHORITY CLASSES ARE HELD AT DOWNDERRY. BROWNIES,CUBS,GUIDES,SCOUTS AND RANGERS FLOURISH IN THE NEIGHBOURING VILLAGES,AND THERE ARE VENTURE SCOUT GROUPS IN LOOE AND LISKEARD. THERE IS AN ACTIVE YOUNG FARMERS' CLUB FOR THE AREA, BASED AT LANDRAKE.
